panels.title: Total Capacity Overview of Current Selection

targets.expr:
predict_linear(
  sum(
  (
    max by (compute_host_name, resource, availability_zone) (
      cortex_total_capacity_per_host{
        resource="cpu",
        availability_zone="$availability_zone",
        compute_host_name=~".*$compute_host_name.*",
        traits=~".*$traits.*",
        projects=~".*$projects.*",
        domains=~".*$domains.*",
        cpu_model=~".*$cpu_model.*"
      }
    )
    *
    on(compute_host_name, resource, availability_zone)
    (
      1 - max by (compute_host_name, resource, availability_zone) (
        cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{
          resource="cpu",
          availability_zone="$availability_zone",
          compute_host_name=~".*$compute_host_name.*",
          traits=~".*$traits.*",
          projects=~".*$projects.*",
          domains=~".*$domains.*",
          cpu_model=~".*$cpu_model.*"
        } / 100
      )
    )
  )
)[1d:]
, 86400) / 
sum(
  max by (compute_host_name) (
    cortex_total_capacity_per_host{
      resource="cpu",
      availability_zone="$availability_zone",
      compute_host_name=~".*$compute_host_name.*",
      traits=~".*$traits.*",
      projects=~".*$projects.*",
      domains=~".*$domains.*",
      cpu_model=~".*$cpu_model.*"
    }
  )
)

sort(max by (compute_host_name, cpu_model, total, running_vms) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="cpu", availability_zone="$availability_zone", compute_host_name=~".*$compute_host_name.*", cpu_model=~".*$cpu_model.*", traits=~".*$traits.*", projects=~".*$projects.*", domains=~".*$domains.*" }) / 100)

sort(sum by (compute_host_name) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="cpu", availability_zone="$availability_zone", compute_host_name=~".*$compute_host_name.*", cpu_model=~".*$cpu_model.*", traits=~".*$traits.*", projects=~".*$projects.*", domains=~".*$domains.*" }) / 
count by (compute_host_name) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="cpu", availability_zone="$availability_zone", compute_host_name=~".*$compute_host_name.*", cpu_model=~".*$cpu_model.*", traits=~".*$traits.*", projects=~".*$projects.*", domains=~".*$domains.*" }))

panels.description: See if the total allocatable cpus changed. This mainly for debugging purposes.

targets.expr:
sort(sum by (compute_host_name) (cortex_total_capacity_per_host{resource="cpu", availability_zone="$availability_zone", compute_host_name=~".*$compute_host_name.*", traits=~".*$traits.*", projects=~".*$projects.*", domains=~".*$domains.*" , cpu_model=~".*$cpu_model.*"}) / 
count by (compute_host_name) (cortex_total_capacity_per_host{resource="cpu", availability_zone="$availability_zone", compute_host_name=~".*$compute_host_name.*", traits=~".*$traits.*", projects=~".*$projects.*", domains=~".*$domains.*" , cpu_model=~".*$cpu_model.*"}))
